title: Therapeutic Storytelling Application Program for Piano Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate piano performance skills and basic understanding of music theory
context.additional_context: Real-time online classes utilizing digital devices (piano/keyboard, computer/tablet). Students experience therapeutic storytelling-based piano learning through individual and small-group activities.

learning_goals: Learners enhance emotional expression skills during piano performance based on therapeutic storytelling
Learners can create original musical compositions of eight or more measures aligned with a given story

Learners complete three or more works expressing their emotions through weekly music activities (e.g., composition, lyric writing, instrument performance) over six months, and acquire creative expression skills with an average score of 4 or higher on a 5-point teacher evaluation rubric (creativity, emotional expression, completeness).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
